comment: Good mobile 5plens camara is very good

Redmi has better quality phones in this price range. If this is the quality if oppo wants to release in the market at this price range, better don't make audience feel awful with the products. I heard oppo and vivo got nice quality products in high price range, but this quality sucks.Cons: (in comparison with Redmi)UI is patheticScreen resolution is very badCamera (ofcourse didn't expect)Build is just okPerformance is worst ( touch screen issues) it's like I m using 10 years old phone.Bought it for parents who hardly use phone, but still even they didn't like it for the above reasons.
its very low budget phone but realy nice
All functions are ok. should Be front camera light in the phone.

it is not so good ,as espect. Presently my set is not working. I am requesting you to send me invoice bill etc , so that I could get free maitaince  charge from service center . because I have no invoice bill etc.
Prise wise Good ProductNice CameraNice soundOverall Nice Phone

This phone was delivered on  30th July,2020 and the mobile has been causing problems ever since. There are severe problems between outgoing and incoming calls.The network is constantly 3g and under very small occurrences,does it come on 4g.The phone also sometimes severely freezes and lags and nothing can be opened for some minutes.I request you look into this matter and take proper steps of exchange of the mobile with a 4gb ram phone or in the price range of the above mentioned phone
